title: "Google’s new ASPIRE system teaches AI the value of saying ‘I don’t know’"
excerpt: "Google researchers have developed a new AI technique called ASPIRE that helps large language models like GPT-2 and Google's OPT estimate confidence in their own predictions and abstain from answering when unsure."
